N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 451.61 - Contributed capital

State Regulations
(a) The
payments in cash or property made to a corporation by its stockholders: (1)
in exchange for capital stock; (2)
in response to an assessment on the
capital stock; or
(3)
as a
gift. (b) Paid-in
capital. Notes
